entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AddHttpClient configuration action is never called #47357
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes, mvc #47355
  • RDF/RDG inconsistency when resolving query/route parameters. #47353
    8.0-preview4
  • starting with V6+ the dll Microsoft.Extensions.ObjectPool will not load in Powershell #47352
  • IIS Express process memory size is not decreased. #47351
  • HttpRequestJsonExtensions ReadFromJsonAsync can only be used once #47350
  • Update gRPC JSON transcoding property priority #47349
    .NET 8 Planning
  • HealthCheckPublisherError and HealthCheckPublisherTimeout have the same EventId.Id = 104 #47348
  • RequestDelegateFactoryTests migration #47345
    8.0-preview4

Closed

  • Duplicate SegmentWriteStream #45957
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, https, plainTextWithFilter #47152
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47329
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #47330
  • How to move ClientApp from SPA Project to src/ (root folder) #47326
  • InvalidOperationException when using JwtBearerEvents.OnForbidden to customize response and multiple AuthenticationSchemes #33368
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Unable to use SpaProxy inside Codespaces #47299
    8.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Base path validation #47343
  • [NETE2ESDK][Loc]The hyperlink for contents on NET 7.0.0 windows server hosting installer UI on loc OS is EN not loc link. #44613
    Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Fetch logic should check if the asset is present in the list of included assets before deciding to serve index.html #40678
    Backlog
  • [Blazor wasm/.NET 6/AAD] SignalR hub version negotiation fails with HTTP status 401 #47188
  • Unable to get KestrelEventSource event counters when application is hosted in IIS #47313
  • ASP.NET Core does not respect caching headers for images #47303
  • A very simple project to publish SignalR message to Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Redis #46958
  • Consolidate `FromBody` and `FromService` tests into shared test infra #47344
  • Output cache middleware throws when changing AllowCacheStorage on a later stage AND when AllowLocking = true. #47253
  • Asp.net core mvc read request body is very slow #47182
  • [API Proposal] Ability to monitor circuit activity #47325

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.4.23171.22 #47358
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix unobserved JSDisconnectedException in NavigationManager #47356
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0-preview3] Follow up 'Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity' #47354
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • WithOpenApi generates annotations for endpoints without MethodInfo #47346
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Move SegmentWriteStream to shared resource #47180
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • Move a few RDG tests across to shared infrastructure. #47347
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Resolve InvalidOperationException inside HandleForbiddenAsync #47089
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • Adding RedirectUrl option for SpaProxy #47300
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • Update service worker templates to prevent index.html being served when an offline resource is requested. #47168
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4
  • Skip gRPC template tests on macos 11 until external bug is fixed #47337
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview4
  • Rename M.A.Http.Generators to M.A.Http.RequestDelegateGenerator #47334
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Handle Task/ValueTask.CompletedTask return in RDG #47211
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Follow up 'Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity' #47328
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Update branding to preview4 #47323
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play #47209
    area-runtime
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • Add generic variants of MVC attributes #47075
    pending-ci-rerun
  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor
  • Fixed duplicate LoggerMessage EventNames in RemoteJSRuntime.cs file #47280
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • EnumTypeModelBinder does not handle enum flags provided as a list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
